column4: Hey there guys - STILL haven't managed to get Ubuntu to have sound. I have an ASUS N53jq - Please help
If you open a terminal and type 'alsamixer', are Master and PCM both turned up?
And there are no 'M' in the boxes at the bottom of the bars for master and PCM?
I am dual booting, and windows 7 has sound fine
And your speakers are plugged in?  :)
But i know you have to ask
this is the only thing ruining ubuntu for me, no sound
Yankdownunder, its an asus n53jq - it is using the alc259 chip
Any sound related errors in your dmesg output?
- how do i get that - dmesg in terminal?
